Help

```{r}
#| echo: false
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

monsters <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/main/data/2025/2025-05-27/monsters.csv', show_col_types = FALSE)
```

```{r}
ggplot(monsters, aes(x = hp_number, y = str, color = type)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(
    x = "Hit Points",
    y = "Strength Modifier",
    title = "D&D Monsters by Type",
  )
```
